content: Hi everyone, My name's Ross and I use to be a military dependent. My place wasn't in the military, but I still feel a strong connection to the military and its community. I like to stay in touch with my heritage by visiting sites, and remembering the sacrifices that my family and other family like it have made in service of the constitution. On my last trip to Colorado I took some panoramic photos at the USAFA chapel. "http://www.roundus.com/listing/659/#1" Let me know what you think. I also took some at the buffalo soldiers monument at Fort Leavenworth KS. "http://www.roundus.com/listing/861/#1" Click and drag the pictures to change your view. This message has been edited. Last edited by: rtharrison86, Tue 24 March 2009 11:03 PM
